navpoint.label: Home
navpoint.pageTitle: Apple Mac Computers & Accessories from MacMall, The #1 Mac Warehouse
navpoint.descriptionMetatag: Great deals on the full line of new Apple products, Mac computers & accessories. From the all-new iPad to the Mac Pro, MacMall is your #1 Apple superstore.
navpoint.keywordMetatag: apple computer, apple computers, apple products, apple accessories, mac warehouse, macwarehouse
navpoint.notes: 2009.11.09-SEO tags edited by Jet as per Sitewire reco. Do not modify without permission from Marvin/Marix.2010.07.20-Marix added verification meta tags for Google Webmaster Tools, Yahoo! Site Explorer and MSN Live Search Webmaster Center.2010.08.09 - Canonical created by Alan

Blurb removed by Marix.

navpoint.label: Address Book
navpoint.pageTitle: Address Book | My Account Dashboard | MacMall.com
navpoint.descriptionMetatag: You can edit your My Account settings and profile, view your order status, view your payment and transaction details. Options are also provided to manage each of these features so you can view, edit, delete, or add to them as necessary.

Service Plans
navpoint.pageTitle: Apple Service Plans at MacMall.com, Your #1 Apple Store
navpoint.descriptionMetatag: An Apple service plan gives you extended years of coverage so that you can sleep better and be worry-free about your Mac computers & Apple products.

navpoint.label: Service Plans for Mac CPUs
navpoint.pageTitle: Service plans for Mac CPU at MacMall, The #1 Apple Superstore!
navpoint.descriptionMetatag: Get Mac CPU service plan & enjoy the benefits of the true Apple care. Entrust you Mac CPU's to the folks who designed your Mac and its OS.

navpoint.label: Service Plans for iPods
navpoint.pageTitle: Service plans for iPods at MacMall.com, The #1 Apple Superstore!
navpoint.descriptionMetatag: Have an iPod service plan to enjoy peace of mind, avoid hassles and save money in replacing your iPod and its accessories.

navpoint.label: Service Plans for Products
navpoint.pageTitle: Service plans at MacMall.com, Your #1 Apple Superstore!
navpoint.descriptionMetatag: Have a peace of mind on your investments once you enroll them to MacMall's service plan. Be worry free and save money on repairs as you got everything covered.
